text: André Hoffmann (born 11 August 1961) is a former German Speed skater who made a huge step forwards in the 1987-1988 season and won two 1500 metres races in the World Cup. It was even though highly surprising that he took gold medal in the 1500 m at the 1988 Olympics in Calgary.
